intro: You are the lead Security Engineer in your firm. Yesterday the firm was attacked by a group of hackers and they have altered the system settings and may have stolen some data. Your first task is to recover the system passwords they have altered.
Good!, Now You have unlocked the admin previleges. But still lot more to be done to recover the system.
That wasn't much of a challenge, Was it?
They configured the system such that when we click 'Send Password' button, the password will be send to the predefined email ID
Note the email ID they left behind, we might be able to use it later.
